calm_focus.description: Focused but relaxed, good for coding/reading. High alpha / low beta range.

deep_chill.description: Drifty, introspective, for reflection. Theta range.

feral_god_mode.description: High alert, fast pattern recognition. Beta-high range.

pre_sleep.description: Wind-down, not for juggling. Delta range.

flow_state.description: Alpha wave entrainment for creative flow.
